description: The Skill Development Promotion Scheme in Goa supports skill training programs to enhance employability and entrepreneurship among youth. It provides financial assistance to training institutions and individuals for skill development initiatives.
key_features: Financial support for skill training programs

benefits.financial_assistance: Up to Rs. 10 Lakhs for training programs
benefits.stipend: Stipends for trainees, max Rs. 5,000 per trainee

institution_criteria: Registered training institutions or NGOs in Goa
Must have experience in skill development

steps: Obtain the application form from the Directorate of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship, Goa
Submit a detailed training proposal or individual application
Attach required documents, including institution registration or residency proof
Applications are reviewed by the Directorate
Approved applicants receive funding or stipends
application_process.note: Training programs must align with industry needs

special_notes: Funding is released based on training outcomes
Priority is given to programs addressing local industry needs
Trainees must complete the program to receive stipends
